name: Noah the survivor
description:
The game is about a man called Noah and his family who has been tasked by God to build an ark and save his family from the upcoming flood which will kill every human on earth for being evil.make sure to bring a pair of every animal in the world along.In the game you will get to explore each level and find resources to build the ark and you will have a chance to feed the animals as well.

If you purchase the game you are free to use any of this assets in your own game as well which includes a lot of things different types of environments, animations, character models, an well detailed ark model and lots of textures all on unreal engine 4 which you have access to.

If you like the game, feel free to donate any money for me to be able to continue keep making similar type of games like this.
